channel.description: Recent content in Wireless Modem on 0x000216

item.title: T-Mobile 3G Aircard For PC and Mac
item.description: Want to connect your laptop to T-Mobile’s 3G network and get free access to their HotSpots? The T-Mobile webConnect USB Laptop Stick can make that happen. This device is a wireless modem with a USB connector that plugs into your PC or Mac. PCs require Windows XP or Vista, while Macs need OS X 10.3.9 or higher. This aircard provides internet access virtually anywhere in the U.S. with T-Mobile cellular coverage.

item.title: You Are A WiFi Finder
item.description: ThinkGeek is offering the ultimate in internet geekiness: a t-shirt that lights up to show the strength of nearby WiFi signals. This shirt will make internet addicts follow you everywhere. You could even become a hotspot yourself and have people at your beck and call â€“ or at least within range of your signal. The Wi-Fi Detector Shirt from ThinkGeek is a black cotton t-shirt featuring a removable decal of a tower emitting signal lines.
